title: What does, "Danger, Will Robinson!" mean?

og.title: What does, "Danger, Will Robinson!" mean?
og.description:
Answer (1 of 3): It is a reference to a common bit of dialogue spoken by the robot in the 1960's TV series, "Lost in Space". The robot often served as young Will Robinson's companion and guardian.


https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RG0ochx16Dg

The phrase made it into the culture, and still serves...
